DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study was to investigate the bioequivalence of Mylan's olmesartan medoxomil 40 mg tablets to Sankyo's Benicar® 40 mg tablets following a single, oral 40 mg (1 x 40 mg) dose administered under fed conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Fed Study of Olmesartan Medoxomil Tablets 40 mg and Benicar® Tablets 40 mg
DOC.criteria: healthy, adult subjects, 18 years and older able to swallow medication institutionalized subjects history of any significant disease use of any prescription or OTC medications within 14 days of start of study received any investigational products within 30 days prior to start of study
